title: The Oily Footprint
description: A trail of black oil leads to a secret in the baker's cellar...

turns.narrative: The baker’s cellar is cool and smells of yeast, but a single, shimmering footprint of black oil staining the stone floor.
turns.convergence: The footprint leads to a wall that shouldn't be hollow, but echoes with a rhythmic thrumming.

turns.narrative: The oil is warm and smells of old wine and burnt rubber. It’s moving slightly, the edges of the print reaching for your boots.
turns.choice_b: Follow the trail into the wall
turns.convergence: A secret door swings open on hinges of bone, leading into a sub-basement filled with 'Void-Barrels'.

turns.narrative: The barrels are weeping the same black oil. Inside, you hear the sound of a thousand tiny hearts beating in unison.
turns.convergence: The labels are written in a script that shifts when you look away—they say 'Sustenance for the Silent'.

turns.narrative: A 'Shadow-Rat'—the size of a dog, its fur made of black smoke—leaps from the rafters, its teeth sparking with violet electricity.
turns.convergence: The flour sticks to the smoke-fur, revealing the rat's physical core—a heart made of a glowing 'Void-Seed'.

turns.narrative: The baker enters, his face streaked with soot. He’s not angry; he’s terrified. 'The rats... they brought the oil to keep us warm,' he whimpers.
turns.convergence: The oil begins to pool around his feet, forming a 'Shadow-Anchor' that pins him to the spot.

turns.narrative: The shadow-mire is rising. You must sever the connection between the baker and the Void-Seed. The air is cold and smells of wet earth.
turns.convergence: The anchor snaps, and the oil retreats back into the barrels with a sound like a heavy sigh.

turns.narrative: The Shadow-Rat dissolves into a puddle of 'Liquid-Ink'. The baker gives you a 'Sourdough-Starter' that never dies.
turns.convergence: The starter is warm to the touch and smells of a summer field. It's a 'Living-Food' item.

turns.narrative: The 'Oily Footprint' is gone, but the cellar walls remain stained purple. The baker promises to report any more 'gifts' from the dark.
turns.convergence: The sun peeks through the cellar window, turning the dust motes into tiny, golden sparks.

turns.narrative: As you leave, the smell of fresh bread from the floor above is the best thing you've smelled all day.
turns.convergence: The bread is warm and perfectly crusty. It provides +1 Luck for 1 hour.

turns.narrative: Quest ends in the Bakery. The cellar is clean, and the oven is hot.

conclusion: The mission regarding 'The Oily Footprint' is complete. Quest Complete.

risk_matrix.penalty: The shadow-mire consumes the bakery and your legs. (Quest Failed)
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Baker reports oily footprints appearing overnight in cellar

permanent_effects.settlement: Sub-basement sealed; Void-Barrels discovered and flagged
